name: I Was Dead, But…
description:
You died. All you wanted from the afterlife was peace and rest… But a bunch of nosy ghost-hunters just won't leave you alone.

In November of 2021, Neven Mrgan and David Wester participated in a Playdate game jam, working on a little game in the evenings of three already busy days. Dave did all the music and most of the writing, and Neven focused on the art and the code. At this point in Playdate's life, the full Lua/C-based SDK didn't exist yet, so the web-based game editor Pulp was the game-making tool of choice.

This is a short and funny game. It likely contains endless bugs, but it's totally playable and—gasp—enjoyable?

Download David Wester's original soundtrack on Bandcamp
